short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collection of handy tools and tweaks for gamers across the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Steam 'Key Details' box
- Review score
- Online play
- Hours played
- Release date

Context menu search for games
- gg.deals
- Steam

Context menu redeem game keys
- Steam
- GOG
- Epic

PCGamer.com article enhancements
- Replace obtrusive videos with images
- Highlight Steam links
